languages.text: {n}Тонкие пальцы в кабалитской перчатке вцепляются в ваше лицо, когти оставляют глубокие царапины на щеках и подбородке, а горла касается край острого лезвия. Взбешенный Маражай шипит что-то нечленораздельное... и отпускает вас, неописуемым усилием воли подавив желание убить вас на месте.{/n}

{n}The slender fingers in the Kabalite's glove clutch at your face, the claws leaving deep scratches on your cheeks and forehead. The edge of a razor-sharp blade presses at your throat. Marazhai furiously hisses something incomprehensible... But then he releases his grip, suppressing his desire to kill you on the spot with an enormous effort of willpower.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тонкие пальцы в кабалитской перчатке вцепляются в ваше лицо, когти оставляют глубокие царапины на щеках и подбородке, а горла касается край острого лезвия. Взбешенный Маражай шипит что-то нечленораздельное... и отпускает вас, неописуемым усилием воли подавив желание убить вас на месте.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The slender fingers in a Kabalite glove clutch at your face, claws leaving deep scratches on the cheeks and forehead. The edge of a razor-sharp blade presses at your throat, Marazhai furiously hisses something incomprehensible... But then releases his grip, having suppressed the desire to kill you on the spot with a titanic effort of will.{/n}

But then releases his grip, having suppressed the desire to kill you on the spot with a titanic effort of will.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les doigts fins de son gant de Kabalite agrippent votre visage et vous labourent le front et les joues. Le tranchant d'une lame de rasoir vous appuie sur la gorge. Furieux, Marazhai siffle quelque chose d'incompréhensible... Puis relâche son emprise en refoulant son envie de vous tuer sur-le-champ par un énorme effort de volonté.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The slender fingers in the Kabalite's glove clutch at your face, the claws leaving deep scratches on your cheeks and forehead. The edge of a razor-sharp blade presses at your throat. Marazhai furiously hisses something incomprehensible... But then he releases his grip, suppressing his desire to kill you on the spot with an enormous effort of willpower.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les doigts fins de son gant de Kabalite agrippent votre visage et vous labourent le front et les joues. Le tranchant d'une lame de rasoir vous appuie sur la gorge. Furieux, Marazhai siffle quelque chose d'incompréhensible... Puis relâche son emprise en refoulant son envie de vous tuer sur le champ par un énorme effort de volonté.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋细长的手指抓住了你的脸，利爪在你的脸颊与额头上留下了深深的爪痕，锋利的刀刃抵住了你的喉咙。玛拉斋愤怒地嘶声咆哮，说了些你根本听不懂的话……但随后，他松开了手，以惊人的意志克制住了当场杀掉你的欲望。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The slender fingers in the Kabalite's glove clutch at your face, the claws leaving deep scratches on your cheeks and forehead. The edge of a razor-sharp blade presses at your throat. Marazhai furiously hisses something incomprehensible... But then he releases his grip, suppressing his desire to kill you on the spot with an enormous effort of willpower.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋细长的手指抓住了你的脸，利爪在你的脸颊与额头上留下了深深的爪痕，锋利的刀刃抵住了你的喉咙。玛拉斋愤怒地嘶声咆哮，说了些你根本听不懂的话……但随后，他松开了手，以惊人的意志克制住了当场杀掉你的欲望。{/n}

languages.text: {n}カバライトの手袋をはめた細い指があなたの顔をつかみ、爪が頬と額に深い傷を残した。カミソリのように鋭い刃先があなたの喉を圧迫する。マラズハイは怒り狂ったように意味不明な言葉を口走っている…。しかし、彼は握った手を離し、その場であなたを殺したいという欲求を強靭な意志の力で抑えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The slender fingers in the Kabalite's glove clutch at your face, the claws leaving deep scratches on your cheeks and forehead. The edge of a razor-sharp blade presses at your throat. Marazhai furiously hisses something incomprehensible... But then he releases his grip, suppressing his desire to kill you on the spot with an enormous effort of willpower.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カバライトの手袋をはめた細い指があなたの顔をつかみ、爪が頬と額に深い傷を残した。カミソリのように鋭い刃先があなたの喉を圧迫する。マラズハイは怒り狂ったように意味不明な言葉を口走っている…。しかし、彼は握った手を離し、その場であなたを殺したいという欲求を強靭な意志の力で抑えた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die schlanken Finger in den Handschuhen des Kabalisten greifen dir ins Gesicht. Die Klauen hinterlassen tiefe Kratzer auf deinen Wangen und deiner Stirn. Die Schneide einer rasiermesserscharfen Klinge wird dir auf die Kehle gedrückt. Marazhai zischt wild herum und faselt Unverständliches ... Aber dann löst er seinen Griff, unterdrückt mit einer gewaltigen Willensanstrengung sein Verlangen, dich an Ort und Stelle zu töten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The slender fingers in the Kabalite's glove clutch at your face, the claws leaving deep scratches on your cheeks and forehead. The edge of a razor-sharp blade presses at your throat. Marazhai furiously hisses something incomprehensible... But then he releases his grip, suppressing his desire to kill you on the spot with an enormous effort of willpower.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit den Klauen an seinem Kabale-Handschuh greifen er dir ins Gesicht und hinterlässt tiefe Kratzer auf deinen Wangen und auf deiner Stirn. Die Schneide einer rasiermesserscharfen Klinge wird dir auf die Kehle gedrückt. Marazhai zischt wild herum und faselt Unverständliches ... Aber dann löst er seinen Griff, obwohl er dich eigentlich an Ort und Stelle töten will und sich extrem zusammenreißen muss, es nicht zu tun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Unos dedos huesudos enfundados en un guantelete de Kabalista te agarran la cara; sus garras te abren profundos arañazos en las mejillas y la frente. El filo de una cuchilla afilada presiona contra tu garganta. Presa de la ira, Marazhai bufa algo incomprensible... pero luego te suelta, habiendo reprimido el deseo de matarte aquí y ahora con un inmenso esfuerzo de voluntad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The slender fingers in the Kabalite's glove clutch at your face, the claws leaving deep scratches on your cheeks and forehead. The edge of a razor-sharp blade presses at your throat. Marazhai furiously hisses something incomprehensible... But then he releases his grip, suppressing his desire to kill you on the spot with an enormous effort of willpower.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unos dedos huesudos enfundados en un guantelete de kabalista te agarran la cara; sus garras te abren profundos arañazos en las mejillas y la frente. El filo de una cuchilla afilada presiona contra tu garganta. Presa de la ira, Marazhai bufa algo incomprensible... pero luego te suelta, habiendo reprimido el deseo de matarte aquí y ahora con un inmenso esfuerzo de su voluntad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kabalist'in eldivenindeki ince parmaklar yüzünü kavrıyor, pençeler yanaklarında ve alnında derin çizikler meydana getiriyor. Jilet gibi keskin bıçağın ucu, boğazına dayanıyor. Bu sırada öfkeyle tıslayarak anlaşılmaz bir şeyler söyleyen Marazhai, sonrasında kavrayışını gevşetiyor ve muazzam bir irade sergileyerek seni oracıkta öldürme arzusunu bastırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The slender fingers in the Kabalite's glove clutch at your face, the claws leaving deep scratches on your cheeks and forehead. The edge of a razor-sharp blade presses at your throat. Marazhai furiously hisses something incomprehensible... But then he releases his grip, suppressing his desire to kill you on the spot with an enormous effort of willpower.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kabalist'in eldivenindeki ince parmaklar yüzünü kavrıyor, pençeler yanaklarında ve alnında derin çizikler meydana getiriyor. Jilet gibi keskin kılıcın ucu boğazına dayanıyor. Marazhai öfkeyle tıslayarak anlaşılmaz bir şeyler söylüyor ancak ardından kavrayışını gevşetiyor ve muazzam bir irade sergileyerek seni oracıkta öldürme arzusunu bastırıyor.{/n}
